creator: Petitot, Émile Fortuné Stanislas Joseph, 1838-1917. (author)
description: Petitot, Émile Fortuné Stanislas Joseph: 1838-1917. Born near Marseilles, France; became Oblate; missionary in what became Alberta and Saskatchewan, 1862-1882; returned to France, 1882; wrote on geography, ethnography, and linguistics of the Northwest (Wallace, Dictionary of Canadian biography). // Also published, 2è édition, Paris: Letouzey et Ané, [1888?] (394p.). Details of Petitot's travels through Quebec, Ontario, Great Lakes, Manitoba, and the Canadian North. Engravings made from Petitot's drawings.
subject: Explorers, Surveyors and Travellers--Overland Journeys to the Arctic
Indians of North America
Indiens d'Amérique--Amérique du Nord

Trade routes
Routes commerciales
title: En route pour la mer Glaciale
